value.title: You can’t eliminate bias from machine learning, but you can pick your bias

value.title: Machine learning models predict critical events, mortality rate in COVID-19 patients
value.excerpt: Mount Sinai researchers have developed machine learning models that predict the likelihood of critical events and mortality in COVID-19 patients within clinically relevant time windows.

value.title: PyTorch Developer Day brings a number updates to the machine learning library
value.excerpt: The first PyTorch Developer Day was held yesterday, providing PyTorch developers with a day of technical talks, project deep dives, and networking opportunities.

value.title: Google Cloud's new AI suite hits on doctors' admin headaches
value.excerpt: Google Cloud will become a top cloud partner for hospitals looking to ease administrative headaches driving burnout among their doctors.

value.title: KeyBank Battles Push-Payment Fraud With Machine Learning, Other Tactics
value.excerpt: The Digital Fraud Tracker explores the threat of APP fraud and the use of data analytics and pattern recognition to identify and counter digital schemes.

value.title: System brings deep learning to “internet of things” devices
value.excerpt: MCUNet is a new MIT system that brings machine learning to microcontrollers. The advance could enhance the function and security of devices connected to the Internet of Things (IoT).

value.title: C3.ai, machine learning startup backed by software pioneer Tom Siebel, files for IPO
value.excerpt: The software-as-a-service company that has been using masses of GPUs to run deep learning programs plans to list under the ticker “AI.”

value.title: Australia Post using machine learning to tell you when to expect a delivery
value.excerpt: It will give customers a two-hour window for when a delivery will arrive, although it has mapped it down to plus or minus 15 minutes.

value.title: How Amazon Retail Systems Run Machine Learning Predictions with Apache Spark
value.excerpt: Amazon Retail systems uses Apache Spark with Deep Java Library (DJL) to build propensity models to drive customer experience.

value.title: ElectrifAi Offers New Machine Learning Models for Amazon SageMaker
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker is a fully managed service from Amazon Web Services (AWS) that provides every developer and data scientist with the ability to build, train, and deploy ML models quickly.

value.title: Amazon beefs up machine learning in Alexa to predict ‘latent goals’ that aren’t directly expressed

value.title: AI research finds a ‘compute divide’ concentrates power and accelerates inequality in the era of deep learning
value.excerpt: The analysis reviews papers accepted for publication at large AI conferences such as ACL, ICML, and NeurIPS in categories like computer vision, data mining, machine learning, and NLP.

value.title: Google launches AI tools for healthcare to streamline document review, analysis
value.excerpt: Google launched new artificial intelligence tools for healthcare providers to search through medical documentation on Nov. 10, according to a Google Cloud blog post. Healthcare professionals can now preview Google's Healthcare Natural Language API and AutoML Entity Extraction for Healthcare,

value.title: Sorting out viruses with machine learning
value.excerpt: The ongoing global pandemic has created an urgent need for rapid tests that can diagnose the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, the pathogen that causes COVID-19, and distinguish it from other respiratory viruses.

value.title: How The Future Of Deep Learning Could Resemble The Human Brain
value.excerpt: Just as our brains evolve early in our lives, AI should evolve as we increasingly apply it in real-world scenarios at scale.

value.title: Microsoft is partnering with Qualcomm to enhance AI and ML developer experience
value.excerpt: Microsoft and Qualcomm are partnering to improve the development and deployment experience for developers using the respective technologies offered by the two firms to build AI and ML solutions.

value.title: The Breadth Of Healthcare Applications Of Artificial Intelligence Even Includes Physical Therapy
value.excerpt: AI must play well the closer to patients it resides. Physical therapy is an excellent aspect of the needed growth, as it is a regular and visible part of patient treatment that includes humans, hardware and software interacting within a regulatory framework to improve patient outcomes.

value.title: LinkedIn open-sources Dagli, a machine learning library for Java
value.excerpt: LinkedIn's Dagli, which is available in open source, is a machine learning library for Java and other JVM languages.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning helping insurance companies with cybersecurity: EY
value.excerpt: EY had helped an insurance company tackle the cybersecurity threat and this could be replicated throughout the industry.

value.title: Machine Translation Market to cross 1.5 Bn US-dollar by 2026

value.title: Ellipsis Health Appoints Clinical Experts and Deep Learning Leaders to Serve on Advisory Board, Board of Directors and as a Strategic Investor
value.excerpt: In addition, Ellipsis Health has welcomed Tariq Shaukat, Group President, Bumble, to the Board of Directors, and Richard Socher, PhD, Chief Scientist, EVP at Salesforce, as a strategic investor for the company.

value.title: Review: Google Cloud AI lights up machine learning
value.excerpt: Google Cloud AI and Machine Learning Platform is missing some pieces, and much is still in beta, but its scope and quality are second to none.

value.title: The Best Machine Learning Startups To Work For In 2021 According To Glassdoor
value.excerpt: AVORA, Codesmith, FairMarkIT, Protenus and Ravelin are the most likely to be recommended by their employees to friends looking for a machine learning startup to work for in 2021 based on each company's Glassdoor ratings.

value.title: CSIRO to use artificial intelligence, machine learning, and sensors to end plastic waste
value.excerpt: The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO) has announced partnerships with Microsoft, Hobart City Council, and Chemistry Australia to address -- and attempt to end -- Australia's plastics waste issue.

value.title: How Can We Balance Progress And Privacy With Machine Learning?
value.excerpt: It’s helpful to shift this conversation from AI as a whole to the more specific domain of machine learning (ML), and how we can harness its advantages and minimize its drawbacks. Machine Learning is a subset of AI that describes how computer algorithms get better at solving their domain specific problems by leveraging large data sets with which to train themselves.

value.title: Tech News: Artificial Intelligence and the human brain
value.excerpt: Humans have always dreamt of soaring the sky and since prehistoric times often attempted to fly by mimicking birds.

value.title: Intelligently connect to customers using machine learning in the COVID-19 pandemic
value.excerpt: The pandemic has changed how people interact, how we receive information, and how we get help. It has shifted much of what used to happen in-person to online. value.title: How leveraging AI and machine learning can give startups a competitive edge
value.excerpt: While AI and machine learning are changing the way businesses operate, startups may still struggle to leverage them effectively, with challenges such as cost and a lack of talent among the chief concerns.

value.title: Intel acquires machine learning platform Cnvrg.io to continue AI push - TechCrunch

value.title: AWS launches next-gen GPU instances for machine learning
value.excerpt: AWS has launched its latest GPU-equipped instances aimed at machine learning and high-performance computing (HPC) workloads. Called P4d, the new instances come ten years the first set of GPU instances were launched.
